Title: The spirit of Lei Feng has developed greatly, selling junk to the state is done with great force
Publisher: Hebei sheng Shijiazhuang diqu tuchan gongsi (河北省石家庄地区土产公司), Shijiazhuang
Notes: Collecting assorted junk, including bottles, is made part of the Lei Feng spirit of devotion and contribution to the state. Poster published by the Hebei Province Shijiazhuang area local products company.Part of a series of four.
